data.title: Average Food with Fair Prices
data.text: e stopped for a quick bite and I was overwhelmed with the smell of something burning.  Upon entrance, we were promptly seated and welcomed with a bowl of tortillas and salsa.  The waitress was friendly and the food arrived in small doses (unlike most restaurants where they serve everyone’s order at the same time).  I ordered the taco salad with shrimp (which had generous portions), it was very good.  The kids had burritos and my husband ordered fish tacos.  We also ordered horchata, which really refreshed our thirst.  Overall the food was tasty and the prices were reasonable.  The experience might have been better if it didn’t smell like they were burning the food.
